SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterI18n

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterI18n
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageFormatter
Enclosing interface:
MessageFormatter
public static final class MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterI18n extends Object implements MessageFormatter
The I18NFormatter class is an implementation of the MessageFormatter interface that formats messages using an I18N instance. This allows for localized message formatting based on the key and provided arguments.

This class serves as a wrapper around the I18N instance, delegating the formatting logic to the I18N implementation.

This class is immutable and thread-safe.
